AI Description: R DESeq2 is an R package that provides statistical tools for analyzing count data from high-throughput sequencing assays such as RNA-seq. It uses negative binomial distribution for modeling read counts and incorporates methods for normalization, differential expression analysis, and visualization.
Core Features: Normalization Of Count Data, Statistical Testing For Differential Expression Analysis, Estimation Of Variance-Mean Dependence, Visualization Of Results Through Various Plots, Integration With Other Bioconductor Packages
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, RNA-Seq, Statistical Analysis
